title: Check out our retro game lounge!
posting_body: Text ID # 2969B to my cell for more info!
Most of all, this is where you can be you now with THE ALFRED EXPERIENCE.
Located on the East Side of Austin just steps from Austin’s newest rail stop, we are an eclectic combination of studios, one, and two bedroom apartments and two bedroom townhomes.

Complete with a Retro Game Lounge, super “fly” poolscape consisting of three pools and intriguing Aquatic Wall water feature, Dog Park, outdoor grilling stations for sizzling social hours, yoga studio, fitness and conditioning center, and so much more.
We have now added Personal Alfreds for a truly one of a kind experience!

Hello Alfred is a residential hospitality service that provides personal help inside your home from dedicated "Alfreds" - trained and trusted professionals who fulfill weekly requests that residents submit through a mobile app.

From shopping and stocking your fridge and pantry to picking up and putting away your dry cleaning to handling most any to-do on your list, Hello Alfred helps you save time to focus on the things that matter most.
